courses.description:
GT-UF  201

   Global Topics: Sophomore Seminar

Subjects covered in this writing intensive seminar are linked to the region of the sites where students will plan to study the following year, but they do not necessarily have a narrow geographic focus. For example, students planning to study at NYU Shanghai might enroll in a seminar on economic development in Asia, in which China is used as a case study. Students read and respond to seminal great works in the field. Class participation includes presentations, student-moderated discussions, and peer feedback.
For specific course section descriptions, please see your advisor.

This course is open to Global Liberal Studies (GLS) Sophomores ONLY.
